languages.text: "Надеюсь, в случае нашего успешного сотрудничества я смогу удерживать этот, как вы верно выразились, "кровавый бардак" на нижних палубах станции, где он будет радовать вас своим шармом, но не прерывать беседы Вашей Светлости выстрелами".

traits.locale_text: "Надеюсь, в случае нашего успешного сотрудничества я смогу удерживать этот, как вы верно выразились, "кровавый бардак" на нижних палубах станции, где он будет радовать вас своим шармом, но не прерывать беседы Вашей Светлости выстрелами".

languages.text: "I do hope that, should our partnership go smoothly, I'll be able to contain this 'bloody mayhem,' as you put it, on Footfall's lower levels, where its charm can continue to bring you joy without interrupting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s conversations with gunfire."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, в случае нашего успешного сотрудничества я смогу удерживать этот, как вы верно выразились, "кровавый бардак" на нижних палубах станции, где он будет радовать вас своим шармом, но не прерывать беседы Вашей Светлости выстрелами".

traits.locale_text: "I do hope that, should our partnership go smoothly, I'll be able to contain this 'bloody mayhem', as you put it, on Footfall's lower levels where its charm can continue to bring you joy without interrupting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s conversations with gunfire."

"I do hope that, should our partnership go smoothly, I'll be able to contain this 'bloody mayhem', as you put it, on Footfall's lower levels where its charm can continue to bring you joy without interrupting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s conversations with gunfire."

"I do hope that, should our partnership go smoothly, I'll be able to contain this 'bloody mayhem,' as you put it, on Footfall's lower levels, where its charm can continue to bring you joy without interrupting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s conversations with gunfire."

"I do hope that, should our partnership go smoothly, I'll be able to contain this 'bloody mayhem,' as you put it, on Footfall's lower levels, where its charm can continue to bring you joy without interrupting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s conversations with gunfire."

"I do hope that, should our partnership go smoothly, I'll be able to contain this 'bloody mayhem,' as you put it, on Footfall's lower levels, where its charm can continue to bring you joy without interrupting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s conversations with gunfire."

languages.text: 「私達のパートナーシップが順調にいけば、フットフォールの下層部で、君の言う『血なまぐさい騒動』を抑えることができる。銃声で陛下の会話を遮ることなく、その魅力が君を楽しませ続けられると良いものだな」
languages.original_text: "I do hope that, should our partnership go smoothly, I'll be able to contain this 'bloody mayhem,' as you put it, on Footfall's lower levels, where its charm can continue to bring you joy without interrupting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s conversations with gunfire."

traits.locale_text: 「私達のパートナーシップが順調にいけば、フットフォールの下層部で、君の言う『血なまぐさい騒動』を抑えることができる。銃声で陛下の会話を遮ることなく、その魅力が君を楽しませ続けられると良いものだな」

languages.text: “我确实希望如此。如果我们的合作顺利进行，我就可以像您说的那样，把这种‘血腥的骚乱’控制在落脚港的底层区域。这样一来，它的魅力既可以继续为您带来欢乐，又不会干扰大人您办要紧事。”
languages.original_text: "I do hope that, should our partnership go smoothly, I'll be able to contain this 'bloody mayhem,' as you put it, on Footfall's lower levels, where its charm can continue to bring you joy without interrupting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s conversations with gunfire."

traits.locale_text: “我确实希望如此。如果我们的合作顺利进行，我就可以像您说的那样，把这种‘血腥的骚乱’控制在落脚港的底层区域。这样一来，它的魅力既可以继续为您带来欢乐，又不会干扰大人您办要紧事。”

languages.text: «Si nuestra colaboración resulta fructífera, espero poder contener el "descalabro", como usted dice, que impera en los bajos fondos de Paso. Su encanto puede seguir dándole alegrías sin que {mf|milord|milady} tenga que aparcar conversaciones a cada rato por el estruendo de los disparos».
languages.original_text: "I do hope that, should our partnership go smoothly, I'll be able to contain this 'bloody mayhem,' as you put it, on Footfall's lower levels, where its charm can continue to bring you joy without interrupting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s conversations with gunfire."

traits.locale_text: «Si nuestra colaboración resulta fructífera, espero poder contener el "descalabro", como usted dice, que impera en los bajos fondos de Paso. Su encanto puede seguir dándole alegrías sin que {mf|milord|milady} tenga que aparcar conversaciones a cada rato por el estruendo de los disparos».

languages.text: « Si notre partenariat s'avère florissant, j'ai bon espoir de réussir à limiter ce "chaos sanglant" aux niveaux inférieurs de Castel, où son charme pourra continuer à vous délecter sans que vos conversations soient interrompues par des fusillades. »
languages.original_text: "I do hope that, should our partnership go smoothly, I'll be able to contain this 'bloody mayhem,' as you put it, on Footfall's lower levels, where its charm can continue to bring you joy without interrupting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s conversations with gunfire."

traits.locale_text: « Si notre partenariat s'avère florissant, j'ai bon espoir de réussir à limiter ce "chaos sanglant" aux niveaux inférieurs de Castel, où son charme pourra continuer à vous délecter sans que vos conversations soient interrompues par des fusillades. »

languages.text: "Sollte unsere Partnerschaft reibungslos verlaufen, kann ich hoffentlich dieses 'blutige Hauen und Stechen', wie Ihr es nennt, auf die unteren Ebenen von Footfall beschränken, wo sein Charme Euch weiterhin erfreuen kann, ohne die Gespräche Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} durch Schüsse zu stören."
languages.original_text: "I do hope that, should our partnership go smoothly, I'll be able to contain this 'bloody mayhem,' as you put it, on Footfall's lower levels, where its charm can continue to bring you joy without interrupting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s conversations with gunfire."

traits.locale_text: "Sollte unsere Partnerschaft reibungslos verlaufen, kann ich hoffentlich dieses 'blutige Hauen und Stechen', wie Ihr es nennt, auf die unteren Ebenen von Footfall beschränken, wo sein Charme Euch weiterhin erfreuen kann, ohne die Gespräche Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} durch Schüsse zu stören."

languages.text: "Ortaklığımızı sorunsuzca sürdürebilirsek bahsettiğiniz bu 'kanlı kargaşayı' Binliman'ın alt seviyeleri ile sınırlandırabilmeyi umuyorum. Böylece sözleriniz silah sesleriyle kesilmeden bu cazibeden zevk almaya devam edebilirsiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: "I do hope that, should our partnership go smoothly, I'll be able to contain this 'bloody mayhem,' as you put it, on Footfall's lower levels, where its charm can continue to bring you joy without interrupting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s conversations with gunfire."

traits.locale_text: "Umarım, ortaklığımız başarıya sorunsuz ulaşırsa, bahsettiğiniz bu 'kanlı kargaşayı' Binliman'ın alt seviyeleri ile kısıtlayıp {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretlerinin sözleri silah sesleriyle kesilmeden bu cazibeden zevk almasını sağlayabilirim."
